channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Subscribe2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Subscribe2

item.title: CVE-2022-4309|2024-08-03T01:34:50.143Z -- unknown -- subscribe2
item.description: The Subscribe2 WordPress plugin before 10.38 does not have CSRF check when deleting users, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin delete arbitrary users by knowing their email via a CSRF attack.
